semiot and program languag i have base my paper onsemiot and it three dimens i should insert at thipoint that languag ha mani aspect and that pragmat semantand syntact do not necessari cover all of them oncan howev project most aspect into the three semiot dimensand there seem to be a strong tendenc to doso todai cacm march 1966 zemanek h ca660319 es march17 1982 10 10 am 2087 4 3188 2189 43188 3188 4 3188 3188 4 3188 1594 5 31881781 5 3188 3188 5 3188 3188 5 3188 31885 3188 612 5 3188 123 6 3188 196 63188 919 6 3188 990 6 3188 1007 6 31881046 6 3188 1131 6 3188 1139 6 3188 11406 3188 1149 6 3188 1198 6 3188 1215 63188 1223 6 3188 1265 6 3188 1303 6 31881323 6 3188 1358 6 3188 1366 6 3188 14216 3188 1460 6 3188 1462 6 3188 1463 63188 1467 6 3188 1468 6 3188 1477 6 31881491 6 3188 1496 6 3188 1531 6 3188 15356 3188 1565 6 3188 1601 6 3188 1602 63188 1613 6 3188 1614 6 3188 1626 6 31881641 6 3188 1787 6 3188 1788 6 3188 2056 3188 224 6 3188 249 6 3188 288 63188 316 6 3188 381 6 3188 398 6 318811 6 3188 404 6 3188 410 6 3188 4636 3188 464 6 3188 483 6 3188 3184 63188 3188 6 3188 584 6 3188 600 6 3188680 6 3188 691 6 3188 763 6 3188 7996 3188
